meanings.def: having controls that work without needing a person to operate them
examples: automatic transmission (= in a car, etc.)
an automatic rifle (= one that continues to fire as long as the trigger is pressed)
My camera has manual and automatic functions.
Breathing is an automatic function of the body.

meanings.def: always happening as a result of a particular action or situation
examples: A fine for this offence is automatic.
Promotion was almost automatic after two or three years.

meanings.def: a gun that can fire bullets continuously as long as the trigger is pressed
a vehicle with a system of gears that operates without direct action from the driver
